# Data

```{r}

# Load the mtcars dataset
data(mtcars)

# Create a scatter plot of mpg (miles per gallon) vs. wt (weight)
plot(mtcars$wt, mtcars$mpg, 
     main = "Scatter Plot of MPG vs. Weight",
     xlab = "Weight",
     ylab = "Miles per Gallon",
     pch = 16,   # Set the point character to a solid circle
     col = "blue"  # Set the point color to blue
)



```
